name: SirKnight(Unfinished)
description:
The project itself is around half-way finished to what I would have liked it to be. I was working a 40-hour week whilst working on Sir Knight for Brackey's Game Jam, so please forgive the lack of:

- Combat

- Visuals (Combat Related, such as health bars)

- Collectables (I had planned to implement a few, including torches as a primary mechanic of the game)
